subject: Subject: Inquiry Regarding a Late Delivery
body:
Dear Amazon Customer Service Team,

I am writing to inquire about my recent order, #[Your Order Number], which is now past its scheduled delivery date. The package was expected to arrive on [Original Delivery Date], but I have not yet received it. Could you please provide me with an updated status and a new estimated delivery date?

Thank you for your assistance.

Sincerely,

Hariom

subject: Inquiry Regarding Promotion Opportunities
body:
Dear [Recipient Name],

I am writing to express my interest in potential promotion opportunities within the team. I have consistently exceeded expectations in my current role as [Your Current Role] for the past [Number] years/months, and I am confident in my ability to take on increased responsibilities and contribute at a higher level.

I am eager to learn more about the potential pathways for advancement and discuss how my skills and experience align with the needs of the company. Would you be available for a brief conversation sometime next week to discuss this further?

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

Hariom

subject: Regarding Job Application
body:
Dear abc@gmail.com,

I am writing to follow up on my job application. I submitted my resume and cover letter for [mention specific job title if applicable] on [mention date if possible].

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
